page.title: 04Giants come to Stansted!
page.content:
The inhabitants of Stansted alongside a quarter of a million others were witness to a once in a lifetime spectacular recently.A Boeing 747 (JUMBO) flew over the village to the local airport with its 'piggy back' passenger -the space shuttle {"Enterprise".}The space orbiter and crew stayed on exhibition for 3 days. The tranquil life of a typical Sunday in Stansted suddenly exploded as 200,000 people travelled to the airport to catch a glimpse of space technology.After its 3 day stay the shuttle and its mother plane left for its flight home to America.
A 5 day stay by an airship{'Europa'}on its European tour brought thousands of people to the village giving them the chance to lapse into history of Early Flight.
